name: DeFrogger
description:
A Retro Remix by D4V1D0S0

Made for Pirate Software Game Jam 4


Introduction

Frogger is a classic arcade game where you play as a frog that has to cross a busy road. Avoid cars, jump on logs, and don’t get eaten.

In Defrogger, frogs still want to cross the road – but you won’t let them. Strategically place cars to mow down as many little green jumpy bois as you can.

 Cruel, yes, but a hell of a lot of fun! Gameplay

Use the WASD or arrow keys to move around your Cursor. When you press SPACE, a car will start driving towards the other side of the screen. Hit frogs to gain points.

When hitting multiple frogs with a single car, you’ll get more points for every frog you hit!

Every time a frog successfully crosses the road, or two of your cars collide, a life will be subtracted. The player starts out with 10 lives, and can gain a new one as a reward for every 10 points they score.

Statement

I really really enjoyed this a lot. This was my first time making a working demo from scratch, without a tutorial. Because I was fairly busy, I only had three days to actually make the game, but I am very happy with the result. This has showed that with enough motivation, I can turn a game idea into an actual game fairly easily. I have always had ideas for big projects, but never started working on them. This gamejam has inspired me to at least try, and see where it leads me.

Thank you so much.
